commit.message: interfaces: Don't require ChainClients to implement things they don't use
Build: Move wallet RPCs to their own libbitcoin_walletrpcs module

files.patch:
@@ -41,6 +41,7 @@ LIBBITCOINCONSENSUS=libbitcoinconsensus.la
 endif
 if ENABLE_WALLET
 LIBBITCOIN_WALLET=libbitcoin_wallet.a
+LIBBITCOIN_WALLETRPCS=libbitcoin_walletrpcs.a
 LIBBITCOIN_WALLET_TOOL=libbitcoin_wallet_tool.a
 endif
 
@@ -71,6 +72,7 @@ EXTRA_LIBRARIES += \
   $(LIBBITCOIN_SERVER) \
   $(LIBBITCOIN_CLI) \
   $(LIBBITCOIN_WALLET) \
+  $(LIBBITCOIN_WALLETRPCS) \
   $(LIBBITCOIN_WALLET_TOOL) \
   $(LIBBITCOIN_ZMQ)
 
@@ -348,15 +350,23 @@ libbitcoin_wallet_a_SOURCES = \
   wallet/feebumper.cpp \
   wallet/fees.cpp \
   wallet/load.cpp \
-  wallet/rpcdump.cpp \
-  wallet/rpcwallet.cpp \
   wallet/scriptpubkeyman.cpp \
   wallet/wallet.cpp \
   wallet/walletdb.cpp \
   wallet/walletutil.cpp \
   wallet/coinselection.cpp \
   $(BITCOIN_CORE_H)
 
+# walletrpcs: shared between bitcoind and bitcoin-qt, but only linked
+# when wallet enabled
+libbitcoin_walletrpcs_a_CPPFLAGS = $(AM_CPPFLAGS) $(BITCOIN_INCLUDES)
+libbitcoin_walletrpcs_a_CXXFLAGS = $(AM_CXXFLAGS) $(PIE_FLAGS)
+libbitcoin_walletrpcs_a_SOURCES = \
+  interfaces/walletrpcs.cpp \
+  wallet/rpcdump.cpp \
+  wallet/rpcwallet.cpp \
+  $(BITCOIN_CORE_H)
+
 libbitcoin_wallet_tool_a_CPPFLAGS = $(AM_CPPFLAGS) $(BITCOIN_INCLUDES)
 libbitcoin_wallet_tool_a_CXXFLAGS = $(AM_CXXFLAGS) $(PIE_FLAGS)
 libbitcoin_wallet_tool_a_SOURCES = \
@@ -456,6 +466,7 @@ libbitcoin_consensus_a_SOURCES = \
 libbitcoin_common_a_CPPFLAGS = $(AM_CPPFLAGS) $(BITCOIN_INCLUDES)
 libbitcoin_common_a_CXXFLAGS = $(AM_CXXFLAGS) $(PIE_FLAGS)
 libbitcoin_common_a_SOURCES = \
+  util/url.cpp \
   base58.cpp \
   bech32.cpp \
   bloom.cpp \
@@ -523,7 +534,6 @@ libbitcoin_util_a_SOURCES = \
   util/strencodings.cpp \
   util/string.cpp \
   util/time.cpp \
-  util/url.cpp \
   $(BITCOIN_CORE_H)
 
 if GLIBC_BACK_COMPAT
@@ -556,6 +566,7 @@ endif
 bitcoind_LDADD = \
   $(LIBBITCOIN_SERVER) \
   $(LIBBITCOIN_WALLET) \
+  $(LIBBITCOIN_WALLETRPCS) \
   $(LIBBITCOIN_COMMON) \
   $(LIBUNIVALUE) \
   $(LIBBITCOIN_UTIL) \

@@ -307,7 +307,7 @@ if TARGET_WINDOWS
 endif
 qt_bitcoin_qt_LDADD = qt/libbitcoinqt.a $(LIBBITCOIN_SERVER)
 if ENABLE_WALLET
-qt_bitcoin_qt_LDADD += $(LIBBITCOIN_UTIL) $(LIBBITCOIN_WALLET)
+qt_bitcoin_qt_LDADD += $(LIBBITCOIN_UTIL) $(LIBBITCOIN_WALLET) $(LIBBITCOIN_WALLETRPCS)
 endif
 if ENABLE_ZMQ
 qt_bitcoin_qt_LDADD += $(LIBBITCOIN_ZMQ) $(ZMQ_LIBS)
@@ -325,7 +325,7 @@ SECONDARY: $(QT_QM)
 
 $(srcdir)/qt/bitcoinstrings.cpp: FORCE
 	@test -n $(XGETTEXT) || echo "xgettext is required for updating translations"
-	$(AM_V_GEN) cd $(srcdir); XGETTEXT=$(XGETTEXT) COPYRIGHT_HOLDERS="$(COPYRIGHT_HOLDERS)" $(PYTHON) ../share/qt/extract_strings_qt.py $(libbitcoin_server_a_SOURCES) $(libbitcoin_wallet_a_SOURCES) $(libbitcoin_common_a_SOURCES) $(libbitcoin_zmq_a_SOURCES) $(libbitcoin_consensus_a_SOURCES) $(libbitcoin_util_a_SOURCES)
+	$(AM_V_GEN) cd $(srcdir); XGETTEXT=$(XGETTEXT) COPYRIGHT_HOLDERS="$(COPYRIGHT_HOLDERS)" $(PYTHON) ../share/qt/extract_strings_qt.py $(libbitcoin_server_a_SOURCES) $(libbitcoin_wallet_a_SOURCES) $(libbitcoin_walletrpcs_a_SOURCES) $(libbitcoin_common_a_SOURCES) $(libbitcoin_zmq_a_SOURCES) $(libbitcoin_consensus_a_SOURCES) $(libbitcoin_util_a_SOURCES)
 
 translate: $(srcdir)/qt/bitcoinstrings.cpp $(QT_FORMS_UI) $(QT_FORMS_UI) $(BITCOIN_QT_BASE_CPP) qt/bitcoin.cpp $(BITCOIN_QT_WINDOWS_CPP) $(BITCOIN_QT_WALLET_CPP) $(BITCOIN_QT_H) $(BITCOIN_MM)
 	@test -n $(LUPDATE) || echo "lupdate is required for updating translations"

@@ -48,7 +48,7 @@ nodist_qt_test_test_bitcoin_qt_SOURCES = $(TEST_QT_MOC_CPP)
 
 qt_test_test_bitcoin_qt_LDADD = $(LIBBITCOINQT) $(LIBBITCOIN_SERVER) $(LIBTEST_UTIL)
 if ENABLE_WALLET
-qt_test_test_bitcoin_qt_LDADD += $(LIBBITCOIN_UTIL) $(LIBBITCOIN_WALLET)
+qt_test_test_bitcoin_qt_LDADD += $(LIBBITCOIN_UTIL) $(LIBBITCOIN_WALLET) $(LIBBITCOIN_WALLETRPCS)
 endif
 if ENABLE_ZMQ
 qt_test_test_bitcoin_qt_LDADD += $(LIBBITCOIN_ZMQ) $(ZMQ_LIBS)

@@ -272,7 +272,7 @@ test_test_bitcoin_SOURCES = $(BITCOIN_TEST_SUITE) $(BITCOIN_TESTS) $(JSON_TEST_F
 test_test_bitcoin_CPPFLAGS = $(AM_CPPFLAGS) $(BITCOIN_INCLUDES) $(TESTDEFS) $(EVENT_CFLAGS)
 test_test_bitcoin_LDADD = $(LIBTEST_UTIL)
 if ENABLE_WALLET
-test_test_bitcoin_LDADD += $(LIBBITCOIN_WALLET)
+test_test_bitcoin_LDADD += $(LIBBITCOIN_WALLET) $(LIBBITCOIN_WALLETRPCS)
 endif
 
 test_test_bitcoin_LDADD += $(LIBBITCOIN_SERVER) $(LIBBITCOIN_CLI) $(LIBBITCOIN_COMMON) $(LIBBITCOIN_UTIL) $(LIBBITCOIN_CONSENSUS) $(LIBBITCOIN_CRYPTO) $(LIBUNIVALUE) \

commit.message: Build: Move util/url to libbitcoin_server module

files.patch:
@@ -315,6 +315,7 @@ libbitcoin_server_a_SOURCES = \
   txdb.cpp \
   txmempool.cpp \
   ui_interface.cpp \
+  util/url.cpp \
   validation.cpp \
   validationinterface.cpp \
   versionbits.cpp \
@@ -466,7 +467,6 @@ libbitcoin_consensus_a_SOURCES = \
 libbitcoin_common_a_CPPFLAGS = $(AM_CPPFLAGS) $(BITCOIN_INCLUDES)
 libbitcoin_common_a_CXXFLAGS = $(AM_CXXFLAGS) $(PIE_FLAGS)
 libbitcoin_common_a_SOURCES = \
-  util/url.cpp \
   base58.cpp \
   bech32.cpp \
   bloom.cpp \
